reviewText: I'm very pleased it was shipped the next day and arrived quick, the fight footage is great quality thank you so much for providing these fight dvds. I love that it includes the biographies aswell it's very informative if your a true fan of boxing then u should buy it. I look foward to the Holyfield, sugar ray leonard and Robinson DVD sets but please if you can make a joe Louis and tommy hearns DVD set I'd b stoked thankz again!!!
